context: [2] Incubations were carried out under N2-CO2(80:20, vol/vol) at 35Â°C. [3] Incubation was started by addition of syringate or syringate plus sodium sulfide. [1] Cell extract incubations.A 20-liter fermentor was inoculated with a pure culture. [2] After depletion of the carbon source, the culture received another pulse of syringate (5 mM). [3] After growth for 200 h at 30Â°C, cells were harvested by continuous centrifugation (Sharples; 20,000 Ã— g, 17Â°C) under an N2 atmosphere. [4] The cell pellet was resuspended in TES buffer {50 mM 2-[tris(hydroxymethyl)methylamino]-1-ethanesulfonic acid (TES), 5 mM MgCl2, 1 mM dithiothreitol, pH 7.0}. [5] Cells were broken by passage through a French pressure cell under an N2 atmosphere at 120 MPa.
